message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the role of emotions in problem solving and planning, which is a topic that falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of multimodal signals and cognitive models also suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The focus on analyzing and interpreting data also suggests a connection to cybernetics (cs.CY) and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
